4.title: Adopt-a-thon
4.description: A day-long event featuring a variety of animals available for adoption, including dogs, cats, rabbits, and more.

4.title: Adoption Counseling
4.description: Volunteers provide guidance and advice to potential adopters, helping them find the perfect pet to fit their lifestyle and needs.

4.title: Kitten Cuddle Hour
4.description: A special hour-long event where visitors can cuddle and play with kittens, in hopes of finding them forever homes.

4.title: Senior Pet Spotlight
4.description: A day where the shelter highlights their senior animals available for adoption, with special discounts and promotions.

4.title: Puppy Playtime
4.description: A supervised play session for puppies to socialize and interact with other dogs, with the goal of increasing their chances of being adopted.

4.title: Pet Photography
4.description: Volunteers take high-quality photos of animals available for adoption, helping to showcase their unique personalities and increase their chances of finding a home.

4.title: Training and Enrichment
4.description: Volunteers work with animals to provide training and enrichment activities, helping to improve their behavior and increase their chances of being adopted.

4.title: Pet Transport
4.description: Volunteers help transport animals to and from the shelter, as well as to adoption events and other locations as needed.

4.title: Event Support
4.description: Volunteers assist with various shelter events and activities, helping to set up, tear down, and ensure everything runs smoothly.
